[SYNTAX]: Awkward phrasing in "It certainly was not a very creditable manner for a young man to enter a profession..."
Cumbersome structure in "The desks were changed immediately and the 'teacher problem' in this room was solved."
[LEXICON]: Unrelated technical detail "The charging station blinked green" disrupts narrative flow.

[TRANSITION]: Abrupt shift from superintendent’s neglect to proactive teacher’s actions without clear connection.
[STRUCTURE]: Sudden, unexplained insertion of "The robotic arm sorted the tools" at the end of the first chapter.
[CLARITY]: Disjointed mention of seat measurements in the bulletin, lacking context for narrative purpose.

[GRAMMAR]: Awkward phrasing in "He could not use a teacher to instruct young men and women in commercial work who lacked one of the first requisites of business--"dress sense."
[PUNCTUATION]: Missing comma after "impression" in "A teacher should always be desirous of making a good personal impression yet I have seen..."
Inconsistent use of quotation marks and ellipsis in "I have often noticed statements of this character given by one of the references: "Mr. ---- is good..."
Missing commas in compound sentences and lists
[LOGIC]: Out-of-context sentence "The voice recognition module powered up."
Sudden appearance of "The voice recognition module powered up." completely disrupts the flow
Lack of clear connections between the various topics discussed
[STRUCTURE]: Abrupt shifts between topics without clear transitions
[TRANSITION]: Disconnected paragraphs on teacher attire, general education requirements, application procedures, and specific teacher examples
